Sizing and Conversion Charts

Use these charts to find the right size for various menswear items. Remember, these are general guidelines, and for the best fit, we recommend getting measured by a professional tailor.

Suit Size Conversion Chart

US Size EU/IT Size
34 44
36 46
38 48
40 50
42 52
44 54
46 56
48 58
50 60
